page.title: 07HOTELS IN GLENLIVET
page.content: There are two beautiful hotels in Glenlivet: Minmore and Blairfindy Lodge. {Minmore hotel }used to be the farm house where the owner of The Glenlivet Distillery stayed. As each new bride took up residence, the house took a bashing as it was altered to her taste hence its present shape and size. Shooting, fishing, and skiing facilities are availabvle as well as excellent quisine or a quiet drink in the bar. {Blairfindy Lodge Hotel }also caters for the sporting and business clientele. The Dukes of Richmond and Gordon built this building as a shooting lodge, and it still served this purpose when taken over by the Crown Estate Commissioners earlier this century. It became a hotel when it was no longer required by shooters.
